comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Looks like this guy: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Steen although I don't know why he would be in a Bloomington uniform. Maybe they were a farm team for the Indians back then. Nothing about Steen mentions Bloomington, and nothing about the Bloomers mentions Steen.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: According to SABR he played in 1909 for Bloomington. It seems that Bain recycled a 1909 image to be used for his 1915 trade to the Detroit Tigers.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Ach, so...  He made the bigs in 1912, so I didn't look any further back in Bloomington's roster than 1910.
